CreateRange.name: CreateRange
CreateRange.description: Creates an element range. If you do not specify the start and end positions, the range will be taken from the entire element.

CreateTable.name: CreateTable
CreateTable.description: Creates a new table with a specified number of rows and columns.

params.name: nCols
params.description: Number of columns.

params.name: nRows
params.description: Number of rows.

CreateRun.name: CreateRun
CreateRun.description: Creates a new smaller text block to be inserted to the current paragraph or table.

CreateHyperlink.name: CreateHyperlink
CreateHyperlink.description: Creates a new hyperlink text block to be inserted to the current paragraph or table.

params.name: sLink
params.description: The hyperlink address.

params.name: sDisplay
params.description: The text to display the hyperlink.

params.name: sScreenTipText
params.description: The screen tip text.

CreateImage.name: CreateImage
CreateImage.description: Creates an image with the parameters specified.

params.name: sImageSrc
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The image width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The image height in English measure units.

CreateShape.name: CreateShape
CreateShape.description: Creates a shape with the parameters specified.

params.name: sType
params.description: The shape type which specifies the preset shape geometry.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The shape width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The shape height in English measure units.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the shape.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the element shadow.

CreateChart.name: CreateChart
CreateChart.description: Creates a chart with the parameters specified.

params.name: sType
params.description: The chart type used for the chart display.

params.name: aSeries
params.description: The array of the data used to build the chart from.

params.name: aSeriesNames
params.description: The array of the names (the source table column names) used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: aCatNames
params.description: The array of the names (the source table row names) used for the data which the chart will be build from.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The chart width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The chart height in English measure units.

params.name: nStyleIndex
params.description: The chart color style index (can be 1 - 48, as described in OOXML specification).

params.name: aNumFormats
params.description: Numeric formats which will be applied to the series (can be custom formats). The default numeric format is "General".

CreateOleObject.name: CreateOleObject
CreateOleObject.description: Creates an OLE object with the parameters specified.

params.name: sImageSrc
params.description: The image source where the image to be inserted should be taken from (currently, only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The OLE object width in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The OLE object height in English measure units.

params.name: sData
params.description: The OLE object string data.

params.name: sAppId
params.description: The application ID associated with the current OLE object.

CreateRGBColor.name: CreateRGBColor
CreateRGBColor.description: Creates an RGB color setting the appropriate values for the red, green and blue color components.

params.name: r
params.description: Red color component value.

params.name: g
params.description: Green color component value.

params.name: b
params.description: Blue color component value.

CreateSchemeColor.name: CreateSchemeColor
CreateSchemeColor.description: Creates a complex color scheme selecting from one of the available schemes.

params.name: sSchemeColorId
params.description: The color scheme identifier.

CreatePresetColor.name: CreatePresetColor
CreatePresetColor.description: Creates a color selecting it from one of the available color presets.

params.name: sPresetColor
params.description: A preset selected from the list of the available color preset names.

CreateSolidFill.name: CreateSolidFill
CreateSolidFill.description: Creates a solid fill to apply to the object using a selected solid color as the object background.

params.name: oUniColor
params.description: The color used for the element fill.

CreateLinearGradientFill.name: CreateLinearGradientFill
CreateLinearGradientFill.description: Creates a linear gradient fill to apply to the object using the selected linear gradient as the object background.

params.name: aGradientStop
params.description: The array of gradient color stops measured in 1000th of percent.

params.name: Angle
params.description: The angle measured in 60000th of a degree that will define the gradient direction.

CreateRadialGradientFill.name: CreateRadialGradientFill
CreateRadialGradientFill.description: Creates a radial gradient fill to apply to the object using the selected radial gradient as the object background.

params.name: aGradientStop
params.description: The array of gradient color stops measured in 1000th of percent.

CreatePatternFill.name: CreatePatternFill
CreatePatternFill.description: Creates a pattern fill to apply to the object using the selected pattern as the object background.

params.name: sPatternType
params.description: The pattern type used for the fill selected from one of the available pattern types.

params.name: BgColor
params.description: The background color used for the pattern creation.

params.name: FgColor
params.description: The foreground color used for the pattern creation.

CreateBlipFill.name: CreateBlipFill
CreateBlipFill.description: Creates a blip fill to apply to the object using the selected image as the object background.

params.name: sImageUrl
params.description: The path to the image used for the blip fill (currently only internet URL or Base64 encoded images are supported).

params.name: sBlipFillType
params.description: The type of the fill used for the blip fill (tile or stretch).

CreateNoFill.name: CreateNoFill
CreateNoFill.description: Creates no fill and removes the fill from the element.

CreateStroke.name: CreateStroke
CreateStroke.description: Creates a stroke adding shadows to the element.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The width of the shadow measured in English measure units.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The fill type used to create the shadow.

CreateGradientStop.name: CreateGradientStop
CreateGradientStop.description: Creates a gradient stop used for different types of gradients.

params.name: oUniColor
params.description: The color used for the gradient stop.

params.name: nPos
params.description: The position of the gradient stop measured in 1000th of percent.

CreateBullet.name: CreateBullet
CreateBullet.description: Creates a bullet for a paragraph with the character or symbol specified with the sSymbol parameter.

params.name: sSymbol
params.description: The character or symbol which will be used to create the bullet for the paragraph.

CreateNumbering.name: CreateNumbering
CreateNumbering.description: Creates a bullet for a paragraph with the numbering character or symbol specified with the sType parameter.

params.name: sType
params.description: The numbering type the paragraphs will be numbered with.

params.name: nStartAt
params.description: The number the first numbered paragraph will start with.

params.name: aList
params.description: Mail merge data. The first element of the array is the array with names of the merge fields. The rest of the array elements are arrays with values for the merge fields.

ReplaceDocumentContent.name: ReplaceDocumentContent
ReplaceDocumentContent.description: Replaces the main document content with another document content.

params.name: oApiDocumentContent
params.description: The document content which the main document content will be replaced with.

params.name: nStartIndex
params.description: The start index of the document for mail merge process.

params.name: nEndIndex
params.description: The end index of the document for mail merge process.

FromJSON.name: FromJSON
FromJSON.description: Converts the specified JSON object into the Document Builder object of the corresponding type.

params.name: sMessage
params.description: The JSON object to convert.

AddComment.name: AddComment
AddComment.description: Adds a comment to the specifed document element or array of Runs.

params.name: oElement
params.description: The element where the comment will be added. It may be applied to any element which has the AddComment method.

params.name: sText
params.description: The comment text (required).

params.name: sAuthor
params.description: The author's name (optional).

attachEvent.name: attachEvent
attachEvent.description: Subscribes to the specified event and calls the callback function when the event fires.

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to be called when the event fires.

params.name: eventName
params.description: The event name.

ReplaceTextSmart.name: ReplaceTextSmart
ReplaceTextSmart.description: Replaces each paragraph (or text in cell) in the select with the corresponding text from an array of strings.

params.name: arrString
params.description: An array of replacement strings.

params.name: sParaTab
params.description: A character which is used to specify the tab in the source text.

params.name: sParaNewLine
params.description: A character which is used to specify the line break character in the source text.

ConvertDocument.name: ConvertDocument
ConvertDocument.description: Converts a document to Markdown or HTML text.

params.name: sConvertType
params.description: Conversion type.

params.name: bHtmlHeadings
params.description: Defines if the HTML headings and IDs will be generated when the Markdown renderer of your target platform does not handle Markdown-style IDs.

params.name: bBase64img
params.description: Defines if the images will be created in the base64 format.

params.name: bDemoteHeadings
params.description: Defines if all heading levels in your document will be demoted to conform with the following standard: single H1 as title, H2 as top-level heading in the text body.

params.name: bRenderHTMLTags
params.description: Defines if HTML tags will be preserved in your Markdown. If you just want to use an occasional HTML tag, you can avoid using the opening angle bracket in the following way: <tag>text</tag>. By default, the opening angle brackets will be replaced with the special characters.

CreateWordArt.name: CreateWordArt
CreateWordArt.description: Creates a Text Art object with the parameters specified.

params.name: oTextPr
params.description: The text properties.

params.name: sText
params.description: The text for the Text Art object.

params.name: sTransform
params.description: Text transform type.

params.name: oFill
params.description: The color or pattern used to fill the Text Art object.

params.name: oStroke
params.description: The stroke used to create the Text Art object shadow.

params.name: nRotAngle
params.description: Rotation angle.

params.name: nWidth
params.description: The Text Art width measured in English measure units.

params.name: nHeight
params.description: The Text Art heigth measured in English measure units.

GetFullName.name: GetFullName
GetFullName.description: Returns the full name of the currently opened file.
